issues: [FIXED] Erasing name at once (CTRL+A -> CTRL+X) does not erase in the save preview textbox after refreshing page.
If the user already has a Guitardex save file in their browser's localStorage, the starter save file will be loaded first.

If the user already has a Guitardex save file in their browser's localStorage, and has accessed the site via a direct short link, (gdex.cc/?...), the starter save file will be loaded before the browser prompt for overwriting the previous save opens.
